verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> with him, and the <S%H899>garments<s%>, and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>, and a <S%H5536>basket<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>;
And <S%H6950>gather<s%> thou all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H6950>together<s%> unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him; and the <S%H5712>assembly<s%> was gathered <S%H6950>together<s%> unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H6213>done<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H7364>washed<s%> them with <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And he <S%H5414>put<s%> upon him the <S%H3801>coat<s%>, and <S%H2296>girded<s%> him with the <S%H73>girdle<s%>, and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> him with the <S%H4598>robe<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%> upon him, and he <S%H2296>girded<s%> him with the curious <S%H2805>girdle<s%> of the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and <S%H640>bound<s%> it unto him therewith.
And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> upon him: also he <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%> the <S%H224>Urim<s%> and the <S%H8550>Thummim<s%>.

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4701>mitre<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>; also upon the <S%H4701>mitre<s%>, even upon his <S%H6440>forefront<s%> <S%H4136><s%>, did he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H6731>plate<s%>, the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5145>crown<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and all that was therein, and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> them.

And he <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> thereof upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>, and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and all his <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, both the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and his <S%H3653>foot<s%>, to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them.
And he <S%H3332>poured<s%> of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> upon <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him, to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H3847>put<s%> <S%H3801>coats<s%> upon them, and <S%H2296>girded<s%> them with <S%H73>girdles<s%>, and <S%H2280>put<s%> <S%H4021>bonnets<s%> upon them; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>. put bonnets: Heb. bound bonnets

And he <S%H5066>brought<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5564>laid<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>.

And he <S%H7819>slew<s%> it; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%>, and <S%H2398>purified<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H3332>poured<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> at the <S%H3247>bottom<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> it, to make <S%H3722>reconciliation<s%> upon it.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that was upon the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>, and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> above the <S%H3516>liver<s%>, and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, and their <S%H2459>fat<s%>, and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6999>burned<s%> it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

But the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and his <S%H5785>hide<s%>, his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and his <S%H6569>dung<s%>, he <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> for the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5564>laid<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram<s%>.
And he <S%H7819>killed<s%> it; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.
And he <S%H5408>cut<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> into <S%H5409>pieces<s%>; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6999>burnt<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%>, and the <S%H5409>pieces<s%>, and the <S%H6309>fat<s%>.

And he <S%H7364>washed<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%> and the <S%H3767>legs<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%>; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6999>burnt<s%> the whole <S%H352>ram<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: it was a burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%>, and an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>, the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>consecration<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5564>laid<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H352>ram<s%>.

And he <S%H7819>slew<s%> it; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of it, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%>, and upon the <S%H931>thumb<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and upon the great <S%H931>toe<s%> of his <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%>.

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H8571>tip<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%>, and upon the <S%H931>thumbs<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and upon the great <S%H931>toes<s%> of their <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H7272>feet<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%>, and the <S%H451>rump<s%>, and all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that was upon the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>, and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> above the <S%H3516>liver<s%>, and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, and their <S%H2459>fat<s%>, and the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%>:

And out of the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, that was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%>, and a <S%H2471>cake<s%> of <S%H8081>oiled<s%> bread, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7550>wafer<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them on the <S%H2459>fat<s%>, and upon the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%>:

And he <S%H5414>put<s%> all upon <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H3709>hands<s%>, and upon his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H3709>hands<s%>, and <S%H5130>waved<s%> them for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> them from off their <S%H3709>hands<s%>, and <S%H6999>burnt<s%> them on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> upon the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>: they were <S%H4394>consecrations<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%>: it is an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2373>breast<s%>, and <S%H5130>waved<s%> it for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: for of the <S%H352>ram<s%> of <S%H4394>consecration<s%> it was <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H4490>part<s%>; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> which was upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> it upon <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and upon his <S%H899>garments<s%>, and upon his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and upon his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> with him; and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and his <S%H899>garments<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> with him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H1310>Boil<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>: and there <S%H398>eat<s%> it with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> that is in the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4394>consecrations<s%>, as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.
And that which <S%H3498>remaineth<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and of the <S%H3899>bread<s%> shall ye <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And ye shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> in <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, until the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H4394>consecration<s%> be at an <S%H4390>end<s%>: for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall he <S%H4390>consecrate<s%> <S%H3027><s%> you.
As he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>, so the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%>, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for you.

Therefore shall ye <S%H3427>abide<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that ye <S%H4191>die<s%> not: for so I am <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.
So <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> all <S%H1697>things<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
